com.magicbinder.criterias.base

Interface ICriteria

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayValue, CriteriaExpression, CriteriaValue, Criterion, DateTimeValue, MethodValue, SelectValue, StringValue

    public interface ICriteria
    Interface for storing criterias in criterias.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String toSQLiteSelection()
      Convert the criteria to a SQLite Selection String.
      void toSQLiteSelectionArgs(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> array)
      Convert the criteria to a SQLite Selection Args array.

    • Method Detail

      • toSQLiteString

        java.lang.String toSQLiteString()
        Convert the criteria to a SQLite String.
        Returns:
        The SQLite String representation of the criteria. ex :
        "(price > 15.0)"

      • toSQLiteSelection

        java.lang.String toSQLiteSelection()
        Convert the criteria to a SQLite Selection String.
        Returns:
        The SQLite Selection String representation of the criteria.
        ex : "(price > ?)"

      • toSQLiteSelectionArgs

        void toSQLiteSelectionArgs(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> array)
        Convert the criteria to a SQLite Selection Args array.
        Parameters:
        array - The SQLite SelectionArgs array of String . ex :
        ["15"]
